## DiffOpSet type

A patch operation that sets the value at `path` to `value`<!-- -->.

- Represents add/replace semantics.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type DiffOpSet = {
    kind: 'set';
    path: DiffPath;
    value: DiffValue;
};
```
**References:** [DiffPath](doc/markdown/./base.diffpath.md)<!-- -->, [DiffValue](doc/markdown/./base.diffvalue.md)
